div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxvij die Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day gilbert prestone grauntit that Will Inglande grantit
him avande to Johne of murray xij s' and he hede tane Johne of
Retre Souerte for the pament of the saide xij s' Ande the balyeis chargit
the saide gilbert to pay or gert pay the saide money to the said'
Jhone within terme of law

Eodem die Johannes pynor amerciatur assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis Cullan
prelocutorum eiusdem pro perturbio Willelmum brovne et Idem Johannis amerciatur pro perturbio dicte
Johannis et quilibet alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the balyeis and diuers'
of the Counsel present for the pamen tyme that the belman sale
pas' throw the hall tone and commavnde and charge ale nichtbouris
and Induellaris of this burghe' sal big and vpmak thar' yerdis
and dikis tile vthiris according to Justice with xv dais hereftir quhar
throw thar' nichtbouris be quyt of al skatht vndir the pane of
viij s' vnforgevin and of pane of Recompensing of the skatht
that happinis to be done Ande in likuis' to commavnde and charge
al persounis to kep thar' gudis and bestiall fra thar' nychtbouris skatht
vndir the samyn pane to be execut with Rigour' of law

The said' day marione Club was conuict be ane Suorne assis'
Johne Cullane forspekar for strubulance of gilbert prestone officiar'
in the execucioun' of his office and to Amend' as law will et cetera and scho
quyt of ale strubulance of the saide marion' et cetera

The saide day patry Walcar' was conuict be the saide assis' for
strubulance of marione gibsone and scho quyt of ale strubulance
of the said' patry et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem penultimo die Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis chargit Dauy mar' yongar to
Restoir' the gudis and pvndis takin be him fra the smytht
dull duellande in the lande debatabile betuix him
and mariory club and hir' Sistiris

Eodem die thomas Waus deuenit plegius legalis quod Jacobus terny
et Sponsa sua erunt Indempnes pro Donaldo caldour et Sponsa
sua aliter quam per ciam Juris Et Johannes chamer deuenit plegius legalis
quod dictus dictus Dondalus et Sponsa sua erunt Indempnes pro
dictis Jacobo et Sponsa sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet
obligatur ad releuandum suos fideiussores per ostendem manuum suarum

the saide day Johne Cuk officiar was fundin quyt be ane Suorne
patry leslie forspekar assis' thomas Waus forspekar for strubulance of William stillis wif and his wyf
hous' for ony thing hiddirtillis that the saide assis' hede herde or seyn'

Curia balliuorum de Aberdein' tenta in pretorio burgj de Abirdene
primo die mensis febriarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas Couk amerciatur per assisam Juratam pro perturbio
georgij smytht ex ore patricij lesly prelocutorum eiusdem Et dictus
georgius amerciatur per dictam assisam pro perturbio dictj thome
coule et vtraque pars alterj emendabunt ut Jura volunt et dictus
georgius dabit eidem thome ij s'

Eodem die thomas smitht quitus fuit de perturbio thome coule
per dictam assisam

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die februarij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo secundo

The saide day cristy prat oblist him his ayris executoris and
assignez be the fathtis of thar bodiis to releiwe freithe and
keip Allane litstar his ayris executoris and assignez skathtles
and fre of all Somes of money and malys that he Resauis
fra the saide Allane of ane hous' maile liand' vteuthe
the port of the gallougat pertening to Williame prat

The saide day the aldirmane balyeis Consale and communite
present for the tyme ordanit Androw Cullane ane of the denys
of gilde to ger' big and vpmak the scule one thar' expens'

The saide day thomas leslie one that ane part Ande Williame
goldsmitht one that vthir part oblist thame be thar' handis
vphaldin to stande and abide at the finale decret and ordinance
of thir personis Alexander rede Alexander rese mastir Johne badenaghe
Jonhne' of mar' thomas Waus and patry leslie Anent certane
maile clamyt be the said' William and anent the thingis that
saide thomas leslie has agane the saide Williame and the saide
personis excepe mastir Johne badenaghe' oblist thame be thar'
handis to convene this day eftir novne in William of chameris
hous' and tak the saide matir to thame and giffurtht thar'
deliuerance tharuntill eftir thar' knaulage

The saide day Jonhne ramsay oblist him be the fatht of his
body to pay to Williame Rate tua barrellis salmond' sufficient
merchande gude viij dais befor lammes nixt to cum and the saide
Johne chavmer oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to releiwe and
keip the saide Jonhne Ramsay Skathtles and fre of the pament
of the said' tua barrellis of Salmond' becaus' he Is bindin
for him and his dett to the saide William

The saide day Johne rede wobstar Johne Williamesone Alexander mernoche Androw hall thome Wobstar
gilbert mernoche Williame Auchevalde wobstar and Jhone paule Ilkan of tham
was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Alexander Rede forspekar forspekar becaus' thai dide nocht
It that accordit thame to do one Candilmesday' in the processioune eftir the auld'
honorabill and lovabill consuetude of the burghe' and for the quhilkis thai war' in ane Amerciament of
the Court and to Amende as law will and forber' in tyme to Cum becaus' thai pretendit
thame to precede and pas' in the place of the processione quhar' the talyouris hed' vys'
to pas' tymes bigane

The saide day James Crukschank was conuict' be the saide assis' Alexander Rede forspekar for
the breking of commone ordinance in the situacioun' and ordour' of the processioun' one
Candilmesday et cetera Ande for strubulance of Williame of mar' dekin of the
Skynnaris in the execucioun' of his Office and to Amende as law wil and forber in
tyme to cum /

head.foreign: Copia littere Regis pro forestallatoribus Burgj

div.p:
James be the grace of gode King of Scottis To oure serreff of Aberdein'
and his deputis ande to the aldirman' and baillies of oure burgh' of Abirdene
gretinge forsamekle as we are sikkirly aduertist and informit that the fredome
ande preuilege of our saide burghe of Abirdene and burges' of the sammyn ar gretely
preiuditate ande skatht be thare nychtbowris ande conburgess' duelland' to lande
wythoute the burgh' quhilkis haldis opyne bothis Selling ande bying all
maner of merchandis woll hidis ande skynnis and cummes nocht to oure saide burgh'
Abstrakkand thame fra payment of oure taxtis to that entent that the officiaris
to burgh' sall nocht distrenye thame to landwert for oure dewiteis ande taxtis
and als fo be certane forstallaris at Ilk parroch kirk quhilk sellis ande byis all
maner of merchandice nocht suffering oure liegis to cum to oure saide burghe'
and merket tharof for payment of thar dewities in grete preiudice of ws and oure said'
burgh' and elikwise be fleschoris listaris Cordonaris vsing and excersing thare
avne craftis and all vthir maner of merchandice expres' contrar Actis ande statutis
of oure Realme geif It sa be Ande in likwise be vnlefull nychtbowris and personis
within burgh' nychtwalkaris pykaris Rebellouris brekaris of Commoun ordinantis
ande statutis in gret preiudice and skaith to ws and in contrar' the vniuersale wele of
oure burgh' ande in breking and violacioun' of actis and statutis of parliament and'
incontrar' equite and Justice gefe It sabe and oure will is herfore and we charge
youe strately and commandis that yhe incontinent thar our lettrez sene but delay pas'
and be opyn' proclamacioun' At the merket cors' of oure saide burgh' and vthir
placis nedfule quhare It efferis commande warne and charge ale nychtbowris
Ande burgess' of Abirdene occupying merchandice that thai within xxti dais
nixt eftire youre proclamacioun' and warnyng cum within oure said
burgh' of Abirdene ande to desist and ceis' fra all occupacioun' of merchandice
vteuth' the burgh' And' that na maner of personis quhat estate or degre thai be
of exerce or vse vtouthe the fredome of oure burgh' ony maner of mer/
chandice bot the sammyne as sade Is vndir the pane of escheling
of ale thar gudis movable' and that nay maner of craftis men' exerce nor vs'
na maner of merchandice within burg bot his avin' crafte vthir wayis thane
thay ar levit be the lawe vndir the panys forsaide and' attoure that yhi serche
and seik be inquisicioun' and vthir wayis eftire the consuetude and vse of burrowis all
vnlauchfull personis sic as nychtwakaris pykaris Rebellouris brekaris of
commonde ordinance and statutis and quhay beis convikit thar intill be ane assis'
that ye punys thame eftir the quantite of thar trespas' accordind to the lawis
of the burgh' as saide Is ande this one nay wise yhe leif vndone
vndir all pane and charg that eftir may followe the quhilk to do we
committ to youe coniunctily and seueraly oure full pouer' be thir oure lettrez ke
pand the samyn fore youre warand' gevin vndir oure priue
seill at Stirueling the xx v' day of nouember and of oure Regne
The aucht yer'

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio dictj burgi sexto
die mensis februarij Anno quo supra

head.add: Inquisicio Agnetis andirson' et Jonet andirsoun'

div.p:
Eodem die compertum fuit per inquisicionem curie quod Agnes andirsoun'
et Joneta andersoun' sunt filie et heredes quondam Jacobi andersoun'

The said day William buchane baxter oblist him be the faitht of his
bodie to pay to James Colison' baillie tene markis vsuale money of scotlande
betuix this and the fest of Sanct Johne the baptist callit mydsomer nixt
hereftir for Androu ancroft dettis but ony lang delay

Eodem die Johannis strathachin scissor conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex
ore gilbertus menyeis prelocutorem eiusdem pro perturbio Willelmum Skene Et cuj
emendabit ut Jura volunt Et Idem Willelmus skene quitus de perturbio
dictj Johannis

The said day Will of gordone fischear in futy was in amerciament of the Court
be the said assis' alexander menyeis forspekar for the strublance of Androw
mathouson' and tile amend as law will and forber in tyme tocum Ande the
said androw quyt of ale strublance of the said William

The said day William Walace in futy was in amerciament of the court
be ane suorne assis' gilbert menyeis forspekar for the Strublance of
androw Donaldsone And the said androw for the strublance of the said William
an athir of the said partiis tile amend' tile vtheris as law will And gif
euire thai commit sic strublance in tyme tocum betuix thaim self or till
ony vtheris thai sal pay x s' to sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

The said day Alexander tailyeour and Dauid tailyeour was maid
quyt be the said assis' for ony strublance that thai had done tile Johnne
of strathachin
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene In pretorio eiusdem ix die februarij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes balcrome conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Andree Cullane prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio petrj elmyslie cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et Idem petrus
conuictus de perturbio dicti Johannis

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis februarij Anno quo supra

The said thome philp grantit that he come dettour tile Androw murray for thomas forsy
for tua dakir of hidis the quhilk the baillies chargit the said thomas to
pay to the said androw within xxtj dais hereftir and to preive samekle as
is pait tharof within the said terme to the quhilk the said thomas consentit
to do And the said androw allegijt he want x oxin hydis and tua ky'
hydis

The said day the borgh' fundin be Eduard malison' vppoun Androu
tuliboy for the wranguis' withhalding fra him of ane barrell of ter
was fundin of awaile and the said androw in amerciament of the Court
for the wrangwis' withhaldin of the said barrell of ter be ane suorne
assis' William Chamer forspekar Ande aucht to pay the samyn quhilkis
the baillies chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die Eduardus mailson' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Johannem Kintor suum verum legittimum et procuratorem ad prosequendum
petendum vnam barellam bituminis ab andrea tuliboy et inde acquitandum
prosequendum agendum defendendum Promittens de Rato et grato et cetera

The said day Syme ellene grantit him borghe' and dettour to mage stokar'
for xxj s' and viij d' quhilkis the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme
of law

Eodem die Elizabetht bogy conuicta per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij Rede
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Alexandri Donaldsone Cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and the Counsal present for the tyme ordanit
Androw Cullane dene of the gilde to pay xl s' to the serref for the amerciament of
the last Justice ayr'

The said' day Robert atholl gravntit that he suld marrow with
Johne the Waus' with his demi nethis and to pay him vj s' for
his cobill hir' and vj troutis

The said' day Robert murray was conuict be ane suorne assis'
patry Rede forspekar for the wranguis' haldin of sex s' and
iiij d' fra Johne horne and of ane par' of pantuellis conuenient'
for his wyff quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law

The said' day the borghe' fundin be Johne Waus one Robert
atholl for the wranguis' haldin fra him of viij s' thre
girls' les' was fundin avall

The said day patrik musky was in amerciament of the court be ane suorne
assis' Williame Chamer forspekar for the strublance of Johnne patirson'
pynour and till amend as law will and forber' in tyme tocum Ande
the said Johnne quyt of ale strublance of the said patrik be the said assis'
